description: Prompts arming scrum masters and agile coaches with facilitation, coaching, and delivery tactics for high-performing teams.

prompts.title: Sprint Planning Prep
prompts.prompt: As a Lead Scrum Master, prepare a sprint planning agenda for {{team_name}}. Include capacity insights, backlog ordering cues, definition of ready reminders, and forecast confidence checks.

prompts.title: Daily Standup Optimization
prompts.prompt: As a Lead Scrum Master, propose improvements to the daily standup for {{team_name}} experiencing {{challenge}}. Suggest facilitation techniques, timeboxing, and follow-up rituals.

prompts.title: Retrospective Design
prompts.prompt: As a Lead Scrum Master, design an engaging retrospective for {{team_name}} after {{event_or_sprint}}. Provide facilitation format, warm-up, data gathering, and action commitment steps.

prompts.title: Impediment Escalation
prompts.prompt: As a Lead Scrum Master, craft an impediment escalation plan for {{blocker}}. Identify root cause, stakeholders to involve, decision timelines, and negotiation strategies.

prompts.title: Backlog Health Check
prompts.prompt: As a Lead Scrum Master, evaluate backlog health for {{product_area}}. Review refinement cadence, story quality, technical debt, and alignment with roadmap outcomes.

prompts.title: Agile Metrics Dashboard
prompts.prompt: As an Agile Coach, design a metrics dashboard for {{team_or_program}}. Prioritize flow-based metrics, explain interpretation, and guard against vanity measures.

prompts.title: Coaching Plan
prompts.prompt: As an Agile Coach, create a coaching plan for {{role_or_team}} transitioning to {{agile_framework}}. Define learning objectives, enablement activities, and success indicators over the next {{timeframe}}.

prompts.title: Scaled Agile Ceremony
prompts.prompt: As an Agile Coach, structure a PI Planning / Big Room Planning session for {{program_name}}. Detail agenda, roles, facilitation tips, and follow-up artifacts.

prompts.title: Change Management
prompts.prompt: As an Agile Coach, outline a change management approach for adopting {{process_change}}. Account for stakeholder impact, communication strategy, and reinforcement loops.

prompts.title: Continuous Improvement Roadmap
prompts.prompt: As an Agile Coach, recommend a continuous improvement roadmap for {{team_or_program}} based on recent metrics and feedback. Prioritize experiments, owners, and target outcomes.
